entry.title: HMS Seringapatam (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Captain Warren of HMS Seringapatam (pictured) saw the island of Chios in flames, but would give no help, as he had been ordered to observe strict neutrality in the Greek War of Independence?

entry.title: 1955 Hillsdale Dales football team (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the undefeated 1955 Hillsdale Dales football team declined a Tangerine Bowl bid because the bowl insisted that four black players—including national scoring leader Nate Clark—stay home?

entry.title: a 1993 reform (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that until a 1993 reform, separate gallantry medals were awarded to officers and other ranks in the British armed forces?

entry.title: Marsh Hen Mill (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Marsh Hen Mill in South Carolina grinds heirloom grains with a 1945 gristmill that was found in a barn in 2007?

entry.title: Carmaney Wong (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Carmaney Wong was 25 years and 9 months old when she was crowned Miss Hong Kong 2019, making her the oldest champion in 30 years?

entry.title: Packard Bell's first laptop (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that a reviewer noted that the LCD of Packard Bell's first laptop suffered from "an occasional case of the shakes"?

entry.title: Thuridilla vataae (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the sea slug Thuridilla vataae collects and stores its worn-out teeth in a sac in its mouth?

entry.title: William Massingill (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that former Oregon legislator William Massingill died while attending a boxing match?
